website_summaries.verdict: If you want a simpler natural cleanse, the diverse benefits of apple cider vinegar come in pill form without the harsh taste or upset stomach from acidity side effects one gets from drinking it.
pros: Known to help with heartburn, lowers blood sugar, and promotes weight loss, especially around the midsection
Should be used in conjunction with exercise and good diet
cons: Some users experienced mild side effects such as heart burn, acid reflux, constipation, and thirstiness

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t changed my diet or exercise at all and ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t changed my diet or exercise at all and I’m down 7 lbs in 7 days. This stuff does jump start something... :) I’ll update in 30 days to see if it is working still.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Holliday

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ THIS.  !  THIS IS A BIG SCAM
customer_reviews.text: These pills are absolutely dangers, I took them as directed for about 3 week and they caused so much damaged to my stomach, I went to ER with a horrible stomach pain, i felt like my stomach was on fired , the doctor found some stomach bleeding and he is 100% sure that those pills caused it. I'm still recovering after 3 days in the hospital , i didn't loose any weight and my stomach has so much damaged due to this medicine, also i have to mention that this company is located in CHINA! So DO NOT BUY IT DOESN'T WORK .
customer_reviews.author: C.B

customer_reviews.title: A-A-A-A-mazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!! I havent followed the directions to a T. It days to work out. However I was afraid to lose to much weight. I took this to cleanse out but also trim down a little to look good on my honeymoon. The pictures are 2 weeks apart. I had to go take my wedding dress to get altered. Can wait for my soon to be hubby see me in a bikini and not shy in it in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: 👍👌
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I gave these a good while before I wrote the review. They definitely helped clean me out. I lost about 15 lbs. I cut down on portion size and I walk a bit more but nothing like a gym workout. These won't be a miracle pill and the clean out brought frequent restroom breaks but better out than in!
customer_reviews.author: Stickie

customer_reviews.title: Balanced Body Ph Levels
customer_reviews.text: This product has improved my body completely. As you know results vary, however you owe it to yourself to try it. My Ph levels have regulated slowly & unexpectedly. I bought it for weight loss & slowly but surely I've noticed the change with this and simple calorie reduction. I'm ok w the pace, I wasn't expecting overnight changed & this allows me to adjust at a rate that is sustainable. I take three times daily as my personal choice because it's a lot of work this pills does so I figure why not provide consistent support through out the day. I also got the weight loss Fat Burner & on 1st use appetite was SUPPRESSED. =D
customer_reviews.author: Anatisadalia🐞

customer_reviews.title: Take these for hot flashes ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Apple cider vinegar is any old remedy to lessen hot flashes of perimenopause and menopause. I suffer from awful hot flashes and night sweats, and have been choking down a slew of vitamins daily looking for relief. I still have to take birth control so my options are very limited. I've been taking these vinegar pills for 10 days now, and am experiencing marked improvement. On a funny note, my pee reeked of vinegar the first couple of days, but that quickly subsided. I highly recommend this product even after such a short time. And if it helps me lose weight, then hey added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try...
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking this 4 days ago and have lost 3 lbs. This doesn’t give me any adverse side effects but I always take it after I have eaten something. Besides losing weight it has made me regular. This is a definite plus for someone who was only going once a week. Looking forward to see what else it will do for me.
customer_reviews.author: KAE

customer_reviews.title: Bonus help to a lifestyle change
customer_reviews.text: Have lost 10 pounds since my journey started three weeks ago. This supplement mixed with a healthy diet and regular exercise is magic. I have definitely noticed a significant decrease in bloating and in appetite. Snacking was a huge obstacle to previous weight loss attempts, and curbing hunger was a nice surprise while trying this out. If you're trying to lose weight I think this would be a great additive to try. Edit: I also have hypothyroid, so I find this to be a great metabolism booster. Losing weight is definitely harder with this condition, and I feel this gives me the extra help I need to overcome that.
customer_reviews.author: Avo

customer_reviews.title: I can fit my dress :)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and received this item last week. I've been taking 1 a day with dinner for about a week. It helps a lot with bloating, especially when drinking it with a full bottle of water. My stomach has gone down over the past few days, and I've dropped 2 lbs. It's not harsh, it doesn't make me feel sick, nor do I have that urgent feeling when it's time to go to the bathroom. I don't burp the taste of vinegar either. I'm really happy with this product because I was able to get my tummy down in time to wear a dress in this 80 degree weather. I will be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The first day I took 1 and not with food, the 2nd and 3rd day I took two and with my breakfast and I felt so energized all throughout the day and I was even in a better mood also! I will most definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Lost 6 pounds in 4 days with these. I mentioned them on my social media page and got a lot of people to try them as well and they're having good results with them!
customer_reviews.author: TayVine

customer_reviews.title: I plan on taking this for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it every day for a couple of weeks now, and I really notice the difference. My stomach has really gone down. I have lost a little bit of weight, but what really excites me is it seems to have come off my tummy, which has always been a problem area for me. I plan on taking this for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndal Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Ladies, stop drinking nasty acv straight
customer_reviews.text: THIS!!!!!!! Okay, so I am taking time out of my crazy schedule to tell you that you need this!!!!! It’s amazing!!! I noticed a difference in 3 days. 10 pounds gone in 30 days!!!! I started out with 1, and began taking 2 per day. I’ll cut back to 1 soon. I wanted to reap the benefits of acv and cayenne, but I just can’t bring myself to drink it. I have had other acv pills that smell strongly. These have NO smell!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: A great buy - easy on the stomach.
customer_reviews.text: Apple cider vinegar is so good for you in so many different ways... but the taste. Gross. And if you have IBS like I do, it's just way too acidic to a shot (or more) a day - even with food. Tried these on a whim and they're fantastic. No gross taste to chok down, but also no upset stomach to deal with. I highly recommend to anyone who wants the benefits of apple cider vinegar but just can't ingest the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: dar

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but it's a must do on these caps. I started out with 1 cap but didnt see a difference. So then I tried 2 caps every morning and in 2 weeks I lost 9lbs! Note: I did try cutting out the sweets.. So cutting out sweets completely would have probably given more results... But hey its a start!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I have lots of energy and i have lost 10lbs in a month it's terrific.
customer_reviews.text: I give this a 5* because it's well worth it, I have lots of energy and i have lost 10lbs in a month it's terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Trinette

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive item shown
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused as to why the bottle that got shipped to me looks different than as shown and says Nobi Nutrition but there is a sticker attached with Hasvasu nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Julie St

customer_reviews.title: LR Review / IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This product works with discipline. Do not expect results if you do not try to manage what you eat for weight loss. I not only took for 2 weeks M-F, I also cut out most Sugars and Starch. I also started drinking more water. I didn't have any side effects and doesn't make me feel funny. It really curves your appetite. It works but you have to do your part. I would also encourage, for those trying to lose, to do exercise because for me it is jump rope for about 5-10 minutes a day. I have lost 20lbs for the month of January 2018.
customer_reviews.author: lisa rogers

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to say I wouldn't recommend it to anyone because I know every body is ...
customer_reviews.text: I started getting hot flashes and sweating profusely within a week after using this product. I stopped using it. I don't want to say I wouldn't recommend it to anyone because I know every body is different.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Scire

customer_reviews.title: 79lbs Down!
customer_reviews.text: Have always wanted to try Apple Cider but was put off by some of the reports that the liquid version was damaging to teeth so I was pleased to finally find this product which seems to be recommended by various websites. I have been using this with Slim Fast and whilst I can’t guarantee that this helps weight loss I have lost a total of 79lbs in 10 months by using a combination of the 2 products. The pill is easy to take with no aftertaste and is at the high end of the Apple Cider Vinegar market - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MrNYC

customer_reviews.title: No more heartburn!  YAY!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these pills for a week now and i am sleeping through the night free of heartburn and acid reflux symptoms! I am so happy i tried them as trying to consume apple cider vinegar in it's liquid form is quite harsh the taste is awful. It's a great natural and easy way to get rid of heartburn! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I usually like to drink my apple cider vinegar fresh out of the bottle but this product is super convenient when you are on the go and don't have time for mixtures. I feel like it has help me shed that water weight & reduced my bloating situation. Definitely feels cleansing and not having the vinegar taste in your mouth is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh not sure about them
customer_reviews.text: I took these like the directions said about 1-2 hours before working out and I didn't notice any difference while taking them. I go to the gym 4+ days a week and 1 hour of cardio 3 days a week and incorporate weight lifting 3 days a week. Im not a super out of shape person nor am I some body builder or anything. I'm your average female that just likes to do the gym thing and eat moderately healthy! I have not lost any weight from these pills. I follow a 1500-1800 calorie diet daily (depending if its a all cardio day or not). Im unsure if I will be purchasing these again in the near future or not.
customer_reviews.author: Lily bug

customer_reviews.title: i’ll stick with the liquid
customer_reviews.text: I took these for two months, and they showed no signs of weight loss on me. Maybe they will work for others, but not myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: Fail! This product does not work like it says, I have IBS and thought it will help and also help me lose weight I excersis 4 days a week and it made no difference, I had previously wrote a review and the company reached out to me that they would pay me 40$ within two days of my review and once I did I never received anything from them. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work and allergies
customer_reviews.text: My face broke out in hives and didn’t lose any weight! I am not allergic to peppers and can tolaerate very spicy high heat food, but there was something about this and didn’t settle with me!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: There are no magic pills!
customer_reviews.text: If this did anything it was a secret. I didn’t notice a difference at all. Back to the cringe of drinking the Braggs ACV which definitely makes a difference! Keeps me regular, helps my skin and I feel like it helps my immune system as well! So I would pass on this one if I were you- I really wish there were “magic pills” for all of the things but there just isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: lovecustomerservice

customer_reviews.title: Would NEVER buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This pill caused SEVERE cramps and bad bathroom experiences (if you know what I mean). I know it’s a cleanser but wow could it be a little more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. For me
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. For me, an unexpected benefit has been keeping my digestive system regular! I’ve tried so many products for constipation and was pleasantly surprised to find that this helped much better than anything else I’ve tried! I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, natural, and they WORK!
customer_reviews.text: These pills are an effective way to detox/cleanse your body versus the horrible taste from taking it in liquid form. I’ve been using them for 2 months now, along with eating healthy and moderate exercise... Get them!!
customer_reviews.author: Wilmarie Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked the product. I am trying to lose weight but my biggest problem is eating when I'm not hungry and I feel that this item has curved my appetite so I am eating less when I am bored. I used a variation of vinegar pills while in college and noted that it helped me in college too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Popelka

customer_reviews.title: MUST TRY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was REALLY great! I can't stand the taste of apple cider vinegar, but I wanted the health benefits of it. I tried out this product and it has been incredible. It helped me get back on track with my weight loss! I took it regularly everyday to get my metabolism going. I felt a difference in my overall wellbeing. I have already recommended this product to so many people. Defiantly try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Hans Wilson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I lost 10 lbs!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these pills in May and I have lost 10lbs. I was very shocked because I hit a plateau on my weightloss journey. I have been able to keep off the weight. I took two pills a day and drunk lots of water. No side effects at all. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps with appetite and digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many different Apple cider vinegar products including those that are gummies and the capsules are by far the best! It’s pure apple cider vs other products that contain other ingredients. I’ve lost 8 lbs in 3 weeks with minimal exercise. It helps curb my appetite and a good example would be instead of eating two cheeseburgers, now I get full from one. I do highly recommend drinking lots of water or you might get some tummy issues (my experience anyways). But definitely drinks lots of water! Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam V

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give negative stars
customer_reviews.text: I take apple cider vinegar with Mother to regulate periods. I bought this in hopes I wouldn’t have to drink that nasty stuff. NOPE first off like others have said the bottle came and it does not have the Mother on the label but now I have gone backwards on regulating my hormones. Don’t buy this I repeat DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Using supplement for 1 yr+
customer_reviews.text: I tried this supplement after hearing the benefits of apple cider vinegar. I struggled to digest the regular liquid form without a reaction to the acid. I wanted to get ahead of an elevated cholesterol level and to curb my appetite. Combining this supplement with intermittent fasting made my goal a success. Recently, I missed the supplement for a few days and I noticed an increase in appetite. One negative experience was early on when I tried to move away From taking the supplement. I experienced a change in my digestive system which led to stomach discomfort. Overall I have had a positive experience and I plan to continue with the product.
customer_reviews.author: phillyshiz

customer_reviews.title: Best Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for awhile. It helps me in so many ways. It helps with my hair growth, my nails, my appetite and my overall feeling of good. I didn't know what to except for this however I am enjoying it. I had to stop taking this when I had a surgery and and heart test. Then I forgot to order more , so for about a month I didn't take it and I could notice the affects of not using it. Once I realized it was the because of this supplement I went right back on it. Thank you Havasu Nutrition for Extra Strength Apple Cider Vinegar Pills! I feel better :)
customer_reviews.author: MCT

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product, I felt I had more energy and my sugar levels helped stabilize while I was on a low calorie diet which helped me not cheat and stay on my goal. However I was disappointed when i ordered a second bottle and got the regular strength bottle and does not seem as effective.
customer_reviews.author: ReeRee

customer_reviews.title: Always quality products
customer_reviews.text: I've tried another Havasu product in the past and was excited to get these ACV pills. They are always quality products and the company treats their customers like VIP. Today was my fest time using the apple cider, after feeling pretty tired with low blood sugar and couldn't function. I'm feeling slightly better to the point where I can move around and make a decent meal to bring me out of my slump. I'll continue to use and update my review soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Turkey

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the Apple Cider Vinegar capsules for almost a month now and I have lost 7 pounds and my appetite during the day has been curved. I'm getting full faster and I haven't had hunger pains in between meals. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hanauer-Brahm

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything for me, but...
customer_reviews.text: I know Apple Cider is good for you and I purchased this due to the reviews, but it didn't do anything for me. That doesn't mean it's no good, maybe it just doesn't work for me or I got a bad bottle. That's why I give it a three.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without these!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these help with my appetite- I do not get as hungry or have the tendency to snack when I have taken these. I feel like I get all the awesome benefits of Apple Cider Vinegar without the bad taste or damage to my teeth. I HIGHLY recommend these to help with digestion and weight loss!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken this for a few days but I have noticed no difference or improvement. Also, I suddenly developed terrible heartburn and I think it may be caused by this product. I have previously taken apple cider chews from GNC with marvelous results and no heartburn. I will probably have to go back to the GNC product.
customer_reviews.author: R Roy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously awesome! If you aren't a fan of drinking ACV this is a fantastic alternative. It is helping my stomach so much. Just make sure that you eat a little something before you eat it. But you are getting the same great results as drinking ACV.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Elias

customer_reviews.title: Stay consistent and you will see results
customer_reviews.text: I tried this to help my painful bloating (cause unknown) but I would always balloon up and feel a lot of discomfort after every meal but if I really commit and take one tablet when I wake up and wait a little bit to eat I don’t get bloated at all and feel very little abdominal discomfort all day long. I saw results as quick as 4 days. These have really helped my menstrual bloating as well. These are definitely worth a try if you suffer from bloating and discomfort. Didn’t notice any weight loss but my belly looked more normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Great Strength. I tried it because of recurrent yeast ...
customer_reviews.text: Personally used it for 3 months for alkalinized myself. Great Strength. I tried it because of recurrent yeast infections and not feeling so healthy lately. After 4 days taking it twice a day. I felt a huge difference in my body. I ordered three times but I tried to get the free bottle they offered I wasn't able to get it always had issues for getting it. Love it!! I'll order them again. I even recommended this to my patients additional to their medications. At least 12 patients gave me a feedback of how much they love this pills. Naturally enhanced treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Polly T

customer_reviews.title: Effective alternative method than liquid ACV
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I just could not choke down liquid apple cider vinegar, no matter what I mixed it with. These allow me to take a daily dose and get all the same health benefits without the awful taste. Plus, it has cayenne pepper in it. Helpful tip: Swallow it down right away. One morning, I put it in my mouth to take but didn't have my drink readily available. It quickly dissolved and I was left with an extremely sour mouth with the added shock value of the cayenne!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try, with low carb diet! Sincere advice ~
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking it for 2 months so far. I lost 15 pounds, I am also on low carb diet, and didn’t work out as much as before. I would say this must helped! I purchased one and used coupon got second one. Now I am going to stop this a little bit, and keep low carb diet, see If it would go back, can’t afford having it for too long.. but you guys definitely should give a try, I noticed weight change at the end of the first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Pao

customer_reviews.title: less fatigue (which is almost nearly impossible for me) and my energy level is getting better everyday. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been taking this for 4 days and I already see and feel results. No belly bloat, decreased appetite, less fatigue (which is almost nearly impossible for me) and my energy level is getting better everyday. Great product! Definitely recommend! Side note: get ready to pee a lot 😁
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scheetz

customer_reviews.title: Lighter version of me
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try any type of cleanser because of the horror stories I've heard. But after reading other people's positive reviews, I decided to try it out. Great choice!! It's easy on my stomach and has made me more 'regular'. I don't take these daily as I try to eat healthy daily. But for the days that I crave and eat all the yummy greasy foods, I take 2 capsules just before or just after eating. This makes me 'go' regularly for a few days, 3-4 times a day. I feel super light afterwards. Capsules are tasteless and there is no foul smell. No cramping or diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Havasu Nutrition Apple Cider Vinegar capsules for about two years now. Though I do have a much healthier diet than I had before I started using this product, my weight has dropped from 194 lbs to 152 lbs within a two year period. I love this product and will continue to use it. I feel better about myself and I feel healthier than I have in many many years now.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite sure what this product actually does
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I see anything buy using this product. I know it doesn’t give me heart burn like liquid apple cider vinager.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed container with partial quantity
customer_reviews.text: Received a bottle that was unsealed. Cotton stuffed back into container. Bottle says 60 capsule. 36 capsules in bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Fowle

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned believer!
customer_reviews.text: Im a guy who was extremely skeptical of these pills and just decided to give it a try. I have been taking these for about 10 days now (one in the morning and one at night) and I’m down 5 pounds without changing my diet or going to the gym. My diet doesn’t consist of juice or soda and I watch what I eat so don’t eat junk and expect this pill to work magic. Will update if anything changes. UPDATE: it’s been 30 days and I’m now down 11 pounds without even working out but I do eat healthy. This product might not work for everyone but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Getting the benefits of Apple Cider Vinegar without the nasty taste is a great benefit. I've tried other brands where you have to take 3 capsules, so it's great that I only have to take 1 capsule of this brand. I got it to aid in my weight loss and I feel like it's helping. I've seen a decrease in weight and an increase in energy. I love that there are no artificial fillers in it like other brands. Overall a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for Apple cider vinegar that is easy to take and doesn't stink, this is the product for you. This bottle requires only 1 pill a day and they are pretty small pills. Unlike some other brands you aren't hit by a strong odor the second you open the bottle and there is no aftertaste once you swallow.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: ACV Tablets...easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten this product several times. I can stomach the ACV tablets. It is definitely a much easier way for me to swallow ACV. There is no aftertaste and no burn as with liquid ACV. Have ordered more than once and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: E Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Grumble
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but this product had me bolting to the bathroom with bad cramps and the runs. I'm not taking it now, but might ease back to using it maybe twice a week or so. I'll let you know how it works out.
customer_reviews.author: christine wood

customer_reviews.title: No More terrible taste - Goodbye Liquid nightmare...
customer_reviews.text: I used to force feed myself the vinegar. Ive tried every single way to water it down, plug my nose, chug it cold, chug it hot, add it to other juices and no matter what YOU ARE STILL DRINKING VINEGAR! So once I found out you can get the same benefits from the pill I never looked back. I will NOT be upset to dump out the last of the liquid at home, I just hope I can use it to wash away all the bad memories of the aftertaste. No Horrible aftertaste, all the benefits, can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba King

customer_reviews.title: Just couldn’t use but it’s probably me.
customer_reviews.text: Good product I used liquid years ago and it does work but now I have some stomach issues as I’ve aged and theses pills gave me pains in my stomach. Stopped taking and went away. It may be just me now. But tgey were easy to swallow, no taste. They do leases cravings and fill you up quicker when eating meals.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!

I will say that overall, I feel like they are really helping me, especially with bloating. I'm not sure if there is a weight loss associated with the pills (haven't weighed), but I feel a lot better and will continue to use this product! Veronica

However what I can say is that its way easier to digest then taking liquid apple cider vinegar liquid. It does not have an after taste and does not make my stomach hurt or feel sick afterwards. I will update after 30 days of use but so far I would totally recommend.

Just wish they were cheaper but they seem to be worth it. I take one in the morning and one in the evening.

customer_reviews.title: The Havasu Apple Cider Vinegar supplements make it easy for me to swallow and help me with my ...

I used to take Apple Cider Vinegar by the tablespoon, but the taste was hard to swallow. The Havasu Apple Cider Vinegar supplements make it easy for me to swallow and help me with my diet. customer_reviews.title: Gives me bad headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for almost a week & have noticed that within about 10 minutes of taking it, I've got a pounding headache! Since it's not doing anything as far as appetite control or increased energy, I'm done taking it! Waste of $17!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the try
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for me but just gave me painful gas. It’s a fluke for me friends sorry, everyone’s different and perhaps I didn’t give it enough of a chance but the painful side effect was just not worth it to me. Disappointing because it seems to have great reviews but it didn’t work for me. I did notice it gave me a little bit of energy before my work out but it’s nothing a little caffeine can’t do ... it’s a no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Stay regular!
customer_reviews.text: I take these every morning and they keep me regular! So much better than having to drink the nasty liquid. It also helps with weight loss. Combined with the right diet and exercise. I’ve been taking it for about 3 weeks now and I’ve lost 5lbs. I recommend it to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing but take your money
customer_reviews.text: Used the liquid form that worked but this pill form doesn’t work, seems very fishy to me that another brand liquid works but not this brand in pills, . never buy again...

customer_reviews.title: It really made me feel better. It's a regular purchase now.

I think it does a lot for health and so it balances your pH level and it just gives you more energy. I use Subscribe and save for this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to liquid acv
customer_reviews.text: I love that I found a pill alternative to liquid acv. I couldn’t stand drinking the liquid so this is great for me. It helps me with my digestion and I notice a difference when I go without taking it. I’ve already bought three bottles and will continue to take this! Update: still taking these and I still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleanser. This product does everything thing it says ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cleanser. This product does everything thing it says it will. I’ve only been using it for a few weeks as a dietary supplement and can already see improvements. Not only can I see inches starting to follow off I over all feel healthier. My skin looks better, i have the start of what is a toned body, and I have a feeling of energy during the day! This is a must buy if you’re looking for an overall cleanser to detox from all the less than desirable products we take in.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love taking Apple cider vinegar. But hate the taste.. I have bought this brand for 2 months and yes It works!! I'm on Keto and this gives keeps my gut health perfect.. my husband is using it and no more heatburn!! Thank you so much.. don't pass this up. It's great and easy to swallow :)
customer_reviews.author: babygirlpink Aka Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointing. I expected good things from reading the reviews before purchasing it but it didn’t do anything for me. Didn’t even make me go to the restroom more at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed this product so far. I bought it to enjoy the benefits of apple cider vinegar without the fuss of drinking it. I have no problem with the taste of apple cider vinegar but I am concerned with the acidity on my teeth. This product helps curb my appetite and I notice I am slimmer around the waist when I take it. If I go a week or so without taking (what can I say? My life pulls me in all sorts of directions) I notice a difference in waist circumference. I don’t know if it helping with bloating or with actual weight gain but I don’t care if it means my clothes fit better!
customer_reviews.author: Denise AmyCordero

customer_reviews.title: No ACV taste or burn
customer_reviews.text: This makes taking ACV a lot easier. I’m just starting it, only been a few days. But if I can get the benefits without tasting it, all good. No after taste, anything like that. Got here really fast. When I got the arrival notification I was like, nah...not that soon. There is was. Very surprised and happy with that.

customer_reviews.title: Really good product and no horrible taste or smell
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I brought after reading about all the benefits of apple cider vinegar but not liking the taste. Started taking them at the same time and both of us have had a spike in energy and mood and dropped a few pounds each. After reading reviews want to jump it to two pills a day and see how that does. Really good product and no horrible taste or smell.

This stuff works like a miracle drug and best part is it’s all natural! No more heartburn or indigestion even if I eat/drink the foods that would cause it before!

customer_reviews.title: This stuff seriously works!!!!! Just ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seriously works !!!!! Just be sure to take it with a big meal !!! My stomach has seriously gone down and lost 6 pounds the first week.

customer_reviews.title: Stuck together
customer_reviews.text: Most of the pills were stuck together and some were open. I'm not sure if this was a bad batch or not. Would like to try them again or at least know if this is normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Taken along with my nitric oxide from kyani, I've lost weight really fast. No burning of the throat or stomach.. just a lot of bathroom time though.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Is what is says
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow and certainly easier than drinking ACV. No effects on teeth or upset stomach with this. I am on the fence whether ACV actually does anything health wise but as long as it isn’t hurting me will continue for now.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to liquid
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product to get the benefits of apple cider vinegar without having to chug the gross liquid! I took the liquid for awhile and couldn’t stomach it anymore. I appreciate it being available in capsule form. No aftertaste noted either.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn Bundren

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestion
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for almost a month now and I havent noticed weight loss. (just been maintaining at 155-160) Granted I havent excersized at all or changed my diet. But it definitely helps with your digestion. I go everyday like I'm supposed too now. So with that being said I'm pretty happy with this product. P.S. I'm a female on my boyfriends account , dunno if that matters but just thought I would say
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely has a cleansing effect, I noticed the urge to go #2 right away, if you don't have access to a bathroom, perhaps take them when you get home. Also take bathroom wipes, it might get messy.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get what you need!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.

I don’t know if weight loss is attributed to these but I feel a lot better and love the benefits of Apple Cider vinegar in an easy-to-swallow pill. I HATE... DESPISE the taste of Apple cider vinegar normally, so I’m happy I could still get the health benefits without sipping it.

I can't get liquid acv down and the smell makes me gag but the pills had no smell and no taste at all. Will update my review after a few weeks to advise on how they are working but I'm pleased so far.

customer_reviews.title: Made me bloated
customer_reviews.text: I thought this worked at first. It helped me go to the bathroom for the first week or so. But, then I got really bloated. It did the exact opposite of what I wanted it to do. I am now trying Burn XT and I feel a lot better.

customer_reviews.title: Best apple cider vinegar pills out there!

customer_reviews.title: Same product seems to be advertised everywhere to help you ...
customer_reviews.text: Same product seems to be advertised everywhere to help you lose weight, but taken as directed I saw no changes and everything is the same.
customer_reviews.author: EEA

product_meta.title: Havasu Nutrition Extra Strength Cayenne Pepper with Apple Cider Vinegar Pills - 500mg - Natural Detox, Digestion, Immune Booster - Powerful Cleansing Supplement, Premium-Non-GMO ACV - 60 Capsules (1)
feature_bullets: APPLE CIDER VINEGAR PILLS FOR WEIGHT LOSS. Our apple cider vinegar pills consist of pure apple cider vinegar and cayenne pepper to promote weight loss, bloating relief, and boost your metabolism. Losing weight with our acv pills has never been easier! With our premium combination of ingredients, we are one of the highest doses on the market to help you burn fat quicker.

NO HARSH VINEGAR TASTE. Our apple cider vinegar is encapsulated so you can reap the benefits of ACV without the harsh vinegar taste or throat burn. Our capsules protect your teeth from the highly acidic vinegar, unlike the liquid drinking form.

HEALTH BENEFITS BACKED BY SCIENCE.* Studies show that the main substance in apple cider vinegar, acetic acid, can help to reduce body fat percentage, decrease belly fat and increase energy levels. Our premium formula is created to boost metabolism function without non-stimulating ingredients that are caffeine FREE giving you the natural option to kick that unwanted fat to the curb!

MANAGE BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS.* Research suggests that vinegar may have a beneficial effect in improving function and lowering blood sugar levels. During a weight loss journey, this is extremely important as most people typically cut out sugars and carbs, which decreases your energy levels right away. If you combine your new weight loss regimen with our Apple Cider Vinegar capsules, you can combat those low levels and push through - helping you lose even MORE weight!

COMBINATION INGREDIENTS TO PACK A PUNCH. The combination of cayenne pepper with our 100% pure and natural apple cider vinegar helps increase the boost in metabolism that you need to start your weight loss journey. To be the most effective, we decided to create our product with unfiltered, unrefined and raw apple cider vinegar powder so that it isn't harsh on the stomach.
